0:
”Alexa, open Costa Rica Retreat”
”Alexa, ask Costa Rica Retreat for the latest update”
”Alexa, start Costa Rica Retreat”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: costa rica retreat
des: Listen to the latest updates from Costa Rica Retreat, upcoming events, what to do in Costa Rica, yoga tips, holistic healing ideas, nutritional information, meditation, daily inspiration and Poas Volcano updates. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
